job_description:
Title: Senior Full Stack .Net Developer
Location: Whitby, ON, Canada (Hybrid)
Type: Full Time, Permanent


Introduction:
Join a rock-solid organization as our client’s next Senior Full Stack .Net Developer and sit at the center of projects that drives decisions. You’ll help one of Canada's most trusted consulting organizations work on the latest project, and be rewarded with great opportunities.


Context: Sr. Full Stack .Net Developer is responsible for helping to develop a portfolio of products, including multiple web applications, mobile applications, reporting solutions, and more. By joining the our team, you get the opportunity to lead the development of various sets of tools that can span Frontend, Backend, and Mobile Apps, across different areas of Asset Management and Operations. This role should be results-oriented, comfortable working as part of an Agile team, and thrive on developing systems that are of high quality. Continuous improvement in your skill set and the software development process is essential. You embrace the opportunity to enable and collaborate with other developers in the Agile team.


Responsibilities:
• Work closely with the Other Development team, QA, Scrum Master, Product Owner, and other stakeholders to deliver the development tasks.
• Provide input into project timelines, estimation, and roadmap.

• Evaluate business processes, make recommendations, and implement system design enhancements/changes.

• Act as a team mentor, helping them troubleshoot issues and remove their technical roadblock.

• Motivate, mentor, and train developers across teams, improving work quality and optimizing performance.

• Implement and drive continuous integration & continuous delivery approach for deployments.

• Should focus on TDD approach.

• Participate in code reviews to ensure design and development process/standards compliance.

• Contribute towards the rotation support process as defined by the team


Required:

- Experience in delivering Enterprise cloud-native and hybrid solutions.

- 7+ Years of experience working on applications built on Microsoft .Net Tech stack.

- 3+ years of experience as a senior .NET developer

- 4+ Years of Experience with a frontend framework (Angular or React preferred).

- 7+ Years of experience in Database technologies like SQL Server, MongoDB

- 5+ Years exp with MVC and MVVM

- 5+ Years of exp with JavaScript and jQuery, and typescript.

- 2+ Years of experience building mobile apps using Ionic/Cordova or React Native.

- 2+ years of experience working on GraphQL

- 2+ years of experience in building apps that run on Azure.

- 2+ years of experience working in an Agile Scrum/Kanban environment.

- Experience working with Azure DevOps.

- 7+ Years of Experience in Software Development

- MSc in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or Information Systems.


Nice to Have:

- Experience with MEAN or MERN stack

- Experience with Node and NEST

- Experience with Azure Windows Workflow Foundation.

- Experience working with SQL Spatial Data


We are an equal opportunity employer.


We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, and other protected characteristics.


Apply now—we look forward to meeting you!!
